function.name: submission_eval
function.description: This function is used to evaluate the below submission to the consultation. This submission is from a news media organisation. Each parameter property is a question that you must respond to after carefully reading the description.

position.description:
One of the following positions as outlined in the description:

1. Professional news content should be excluded
2. Professional news content should be included
3. Other (please describe in one sentence or less).

description.description: Your detailed explanation as to why the submission holds that particular view. This must include at least one quote extracted from the submission that you used to support the position your classification of this submission's position

position.description:
One of the following positions as outlined in the description:

1. Republished professional news content should be excluded
2. Republished professional news content should be included
3. Other (please describe in one sentence or less)

description.description: Your detailed explanation as to why the submission holds that particular view. This must include at least one quote extracted from the submission that you used to support the position your classification of this submission's position.
